input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item specifications and item name information.

Item name:
CafePress - Con Abuela - Natural Canvas Tote Bag, Cloth Shopping Bag

Item specifications:
Professionally printed, thousands of designs to choose from.
Small measures 15"x15" with 26.5" sturdy reinforced fabric handles
Medium features full side & bottom support gussets, measures 15"x18"x6" with 22" reinforced fabric handle
Make this shopping tote your new favorite grocery bag, library tote, or beach tote. These bags are also great gifts for him or her, teachers or students, young or old, for any occasion.
Machine wash cold inside out with like colors and tumble dry low for easy and convenient care. IMPORTED.
We offer 100% money back guarantee, so you can buy with confidence. Your satisfaction is our promise, and returns/exchanges are made easy.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This is an attractive, sturdy, and versatile tote bag made of natural-colored canvas. It has strong, wide handles for easy carrying, and is available in two sizes. It is professionally printed with thousands of different designs to choose from, making it a great gift for anyone, and suitable for a variety of uses, including shopping, the library, or the beach. It is easy to care for and will last for years.
input_text.Response B: CafePress brings your passions to life with the perfect item for every occasion. With thousands of designs to choose from, you are certain to find the unique item you've been seeking. Tell the world how you feel with this cloth tote bag. Professional printing brings your passions to life and makes everyday a new experience. Also perfect as a beach tote, grocery bag, or book bag, these bags make great gifts for teachers or students, or treat yourself! And with CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges and a 100% money back guarantee. The bag measures 15"x15" with 26.5" sturdy reinforced fabric handles and is made of 100% cotton. The small is 15"x15" with 26.5" sturdy reinforced fabric handles and the medium measures 15"x18"x6" with 22" a reinforced fabric handle. Machine wash cold inside out with like colors and tumble dry low for easy and convenient care. And remember, we offer 100% money back guarantee, so you can buy with confidence. Your satisfaction is our promise, and returns/exchanges are made easy.
